712773f-a.title: Manhattan: 42nd Street (East) - 2nd Avenue
712773f-a.text:
42nd Street, east from; Second Avenue. At the left is the Hospital
for Ruptured and Crippled Children, and at the right the Pres-
byterian Church of he Covenant, which will bo deaolished when

712786f-a.title: Manhattan: 42nd Street (East) - 2nd Avenue
712786f-a.text:

Street, north side, between Third and Second Avenues, seen f
the clearing on the south side where the Daily News Building
about to be erected.

P. L. Sperr.

712799f-a.title: Manhattan: 42nd Street (East) - 2nd Avenue
712799f-a.text:
216-226 East 42nd Street, south side, between Second and Third Aves.
The Daily News Building, East 42nd (left) and 4ist (right) Streets,
between Third (foreground) and Second Aves., as seen eastward from the
Chanin Building. Also shown is a portion of Tudor City silhouetted
against the East River and Long Island City. On the extreme left is
the Bartholomew Building.
About 1931.
Ewing Galloway.  inea aS GEV
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
